p: All the in vitro and in vivo experiments were performed in three replicate and results are presented as Mean ± SEM. The Student’s t-test and one-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc multiple comparison test have been used. p ≤ 0.05 were considered as significant. Linear regression was used to calculate IC 50 for % DPPH, ABTS, AChE, and BChE inhibition against the different concentration of test samples by means of Excel program 2007.
